item.title: Emily add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "Om Namah Shivaya, meaning, I honor the divinity that resides within me." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Emily add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Sometimes the Bible in the hand of one man is worse than a whisky bottle in the hand of (another)... There are just some kind of men who - who're so busy worrying about the next world they've never learned to live in this one, and you can look down the street and see the results." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Emily add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Emily add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Emily add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Emily add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Emily add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Emily add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Sometimes I can hear my bones straining under the weight of all the lives I'm not living." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Emily add a quote by Louisa May Alcott
item.description: "She is too fond of books, and it has turned her brain." -- Louisa May Alcott

item.title: Emily add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Emily add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Hereâ€™s to books, the cheapest vacation you can buy." -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Emily add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Be patient toward all that is unsolved in your heart and try to love the questions themselves, like locked rooms and like books that are now written in a very foreign tongue. Do not now seek the answers, which cannot be given you because you would not be able to live them. And the point is, to live everything. Live the questions now. Perhaps you will then gradually, without noticing it, live along some distant day into the answer." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Emily add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "If you can't change your fate, change your attitude." -- Amy Tan

item.title: Emily add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "If you are a dreamer come in If you are a dreamer a wisher a liar A hoper a pray-er a magic-bean-buyer If youre a pretender com sit by my fire For we have some flax golden tales to spin Come in! Come in!" -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Emily add a quote by Sue Monk Kidd
item.description: "Someone who thinks death is the scariest thing doesn't know a thing about life." -- Sue Monk Kidd

item.title: Emily add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "Don't you think it's better to be extremely happy for a short while, even if you lose it, than to be just okay for your whole life?" -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I love you also means I love you more than anyone loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that no one loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that I love no one else, and never have loved anyone else, and never will love anyone else." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "There's always going to be bad stuff out there. But here's the amazing thing -- light trumps darkness, every time. You stick a candle into the dark, but you can't stick the dark into the light." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "You don't need water to feel like you're drowning, do you?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Emily add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "All The Woulda-Coulda-Shouldas Layin' In The Sun, Talkin' 'Bout The Things They Woulda-Coulda-Shoulda Done... But All Those Woulda-Coulda-Shouldas All Ran Away And Hid From One Little Did." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Emily add a quote by Audrey Niffenegger
item.description: "I wish for a moment that time would lift me out of this day, and into some more benign one. But then I feel guilty for wanting to avoid the sadness; dead people need us to remember them, even if it eats us, even if all we can do is say "I'm sorry" until it is as meaningless air." -- Audrey Niffenegger

item.title: Emily add a quote by Amy Tan
item.description: "Everyone must dream. We dream to give ourselves hope. To stop dreaming - well, that's like saying you can never change your fate. Isn't that true?" -- Amy Tan

item.title: Emily add a quote by Amos Bronson Alcott
item.description: "Good books, like good friends, are few and chosen; the more select, the more enjoyable." -- Amos Bronson Alcott

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Songs are as sad as the listener." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Emily add a quote by Linda Howard
item.description: "Do you want to know why men name their penis? So the most important decisions in their life aren't made by a stranger." -- Linda Howard

item.title: Emily add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description:
"Atticus, he was real nice."
"Most people are, Scout, when you finally see them." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Emily add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "Just because you're an atheist, that doesn't mean you wouldn't love for things to have reasons for why they are." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Emily add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "You don't write because you want to say something, you write because you have something to say." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald
